input.sentences: we went to visit the old part of the city .

i preferred the architecture of the old cathedrals .

output.sentences: A man is visiting a city.
He posed for a picture in front of a cross.
He is a tourist and has preferred to visit cathedrals to see the architecture.
He especially liked to see steeples and hanging charms.
While walking around the city, the tourists were separated by the police.
